Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. You're... @, right? ...Cool.'.^Hey, you're @, right? You're pretty cute.'. I'm Alex.#$e#I'll see you around, new girl.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Do we have to go home? ...This sucks.$s
Entries.Resort_Wander: This shit kinda boring not gonna lie... I wish I'd remembered to bring my frisbee.'.$h
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: Hey, you think you'd be interested in a volleyball tournament?'.#$e#Just 'cuz you're cute doesn't mean I'll go easy on you!!$h
Entries.Resort_Shore: I wonder how far into the ocean I could go while still being able to make it back without running out of steam...#$e#I'm guessing at least a mile.#$b#... What's that look for?'$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: Aren't you hot in that outfit? We're at the beach, dude.'!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? Well, I mean, you are... but you gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!
Entries.Resort_Towel: Now that we have everyday access to this island, there's no reason for anyone to be pale as a ghost anymore.'
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Feels good to work on tanning my abs.#$e#Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home. ...What are you staring at, @? Don't tell me you like what you see!'
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: Once I'm famous, I'm gonna visit every island possible.#$e#But I guess I'll settle for this, for now.'!$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: I'm getting a banana shake with five scoops of protein powder. ...What? Is that a lot?
Entries.Resort: Never thought I'd really be into island life... but this is kinda nice.'!
Entries.danceRejection: Uhh... no offense, but no thanks. I had someone else in mind.
Entries.divorced: ...Are you serious? I thought... you loved me. ...I guess that was stupid to think.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: I can't... trust you anymore...', but I'm willing to give you a chance, I guess.$9
Entries.breakUp: You're giving me...?$7#$b#*sigh*... Fine. You've clearly made your choice. You're not gonna see me begging for you to stay.$a
Entries.Mon: Did you know I was an all-star quarterback in high school?$u#$e#See this little star on my jacket here? That proves it. What do you think about that, huh?
Entries.Tue: Today would be the perfect day to throw around a ball.$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask if you want to, but you seem pretty busy right now.'^If you weren't a girl I'd ask you to play catch. ...What's that glare for?'#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Wed_01_old: #$p 5#Hey, catch! ...just kidding. Hahaha.|I wish I had someone to play with.$s
Entries.Wed_01_01: Actually? Uhm...#$b#Y'know, my arm's a little sore, but maybe next time.
Entries.Wed_01_02: Guess some people just aren't meant for sports.'
Entries.Thu: It's starting to warm up. It feels nice.'
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer dude?^Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right. What's your workout routine?'#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my arms day.#e#I always try to do a few pounds more every arm day. Pretty good strategy, right?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's just because of the progress I'm making lifting weights.'#e#I think I lifted almost 300 pounds yesterday.
Entries.Sun: Hey, farmer.#$e#What, you wanna talk to me? I'm busy right now. Let's talk later or something.'.
Entries.Sun2: Hey, @.#$e#That's right, I remember your name. How could I not?
Entries.Sun4: Hey, @.#$e#How's your day going? Mine? Better now that I'm talking to you.'
Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#Some guys think it's weak shit to care about their families openly... but I really love my Grandma!'!#$e#But my Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.Tue6: Don't think there's anything better than a day at the beach with your friends. What do you think?
Entries.Mon8: Not too long ago, all I really wanted was to be famous and rich. I think I'd be happier just settling down, now.'#$e#It'd still be totally awesome to be a professional football player, but... it's not something I'm actively working toward, anymore.'
Entries.Fri8: Hi @. You're looking handsome today.'$h^Hey @. Did you do something different with your hair? Or maybe it's your pretty face that keeps grabbing my attention.'$h
Entries.Sat10: I've been having a hard time focusing recently... I wonder why.$l
Entries.Event_beach1: Of course you do. If you didn't I'd think you were crazy. Insane even. Or maybe just a nerd.
Entries.Event_beach2: Really? You must be some kinda freak.$a#$b#...Sorry.
Entries.Event_books1: Nice try. I know you're just trying to flatter me and get me flustered.'$a
Entries.Event_books3: ...You were supposed to disagree with me.$a
Entries.event_box1: Yeah... I know. That's why I've been trying so hard to be successful in terms of sports.$9#$b#I feel like whether I make it to the big leagues or not, she'll be proud of me.'. ...Thanks, @.
Entries.event_box2: Today is actually the anniversary of my mom's death. Thanks for being a dick.'$a
Entries.event_box3: ...Thanks, @.#$b#You... I feel different around you than with other guys... I don't know how to describe it.'$l^You're easily my best friend in the whole town.'#$b#I'm glad.^...Sorry, is that weird for me to say? It's true, though.'$l
Entries.event_box4: Way to make me feel better, asshole.$a
Entries.summer_1: Hey, farmer. Summer is easily my favorite season.#$e#And right now is the best time, 'cuz we've got the whole season to look forward to! I'll catch you later, @
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, man. You're looking a little crisp. Need some aloe?'^Hey girly. Looks like you've got a nice tan coming on.'$h#$e#Hopefully with how much I plan on practicing this summer, it won't be too long until I go pro.'#$e#You'll be able to say you knew me before I was famous.' Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so eye-catching, I swear I'd have a buzzcut right now.'#$e#*sigh*... It's too hot for this.'
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm boy, I got a question for you.^Hey farm girl, I got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll be able to go pro?'#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You'll definitely be a legend.#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, but only if you practice a lot.#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#Not really. You're more likely to turn out like Linus.'
Entries.summer_Wed_01_old: $p 52#When I go pro, you can say you were my first fan, okay? I'll be waiting.'|Trust me, I've been practicing a lot. I won't let you down, @.$a
Entries.summer_Wed_01_01: That's what I'm sayin'!'$h#$e#You're cooler than I thought, farmer.
Entries.summer_Wed_01_02: Yeah? Trust me. I'm already at a level where I won't have to practice much more.$u
Entries.summer_Wed_01_03: You're insane'. You're just jealous that I'm hotter and more talented than you'll ever be..'$a^That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm more talented and popular than you'll ever be. '$a#$e#Get away from me, asshole. Don't talk to me.'$a
Entries.summer_Thu: You must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day, huh?^You must be getting pretty fit working on that farm all day.#$e#Maybe you'll be as fit as me someday.' Something to look forward to, right?#$e#What's that look for?'
Entries.summer_Fri: What's up?#$e#Is it urgent? I'm doing something important right now.'.
Entries.summer_Sat: Mmmm... I think Sam's barbecuing over at his house.'.#$e#Maybe I should ask him for a burger. I'm really craving one, now.'
Entries.summer_Sun: Check out my new kicks! I bought them in Zuzu city the other day 'cuz my old ones were starting to go dull.'#$b#I decided to just throw the old ones away. I would've donated them but I didn't think anyone in our little town would want some old shoes someone already had their feet in for months.
Entries.summer_Sun4: Your shoes are getting a little dirty... that's fine though!'#$e#Different people have different tastes I guess. I could buy you some new ones next time I visit Zuzu city if you want. You'll just have to pay me back, hehe.'
Entries.summer_Thu4: Looks like you're really getting in shape this season, huh?'!#$b#All that farm work's paying off.
Entries.summer_Mon4: You've got a nice tan going on.'
Entries.summer_Fri6: Sorry my room is so messy.$s#$e#It's kinda hard to remind myself to keep it clean since I'm always trying to practice or help out everywhere else in the home. I'm doing my best, though.
Entries.summer_Wed8: I actually wouldn't mind being a farmer...' It just seems kinda... nice.#$e#I like being outdoors and doing things with my hands. I think I'd like it.'
Entries.summer_Sat10: I've been reading some books recently'... I feel like I never really got into any books because I've been so obsessed with my athletics.' What have I been reading? ...The League.
Entries.fall_1: It's starting to get colder, but not too cold for me to keep practicing.'#$e#That's all that matters.
Entries.fall_Mon: My Granny told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I told her, '...Granny, don't even worry about that. I'm gonna be a professional!'$h#$e#Studying is for nerds, anyway.
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, I need to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Do you think ladies like my haircut?^What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It's pretty good.'#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like you got something growing out of your head.
Entries.fall_Wed_01_old: I think I put too much gel in today. It kind of hurts.#$e#A-Ah...don't touch it!#$e#...what?
Entries.fall_Wed_01_01: That's what I was thinking. Thanks.'.
Entries.fall_Wed_01_02: Yeah fuckin' right, farmer. You're just trying to make fun of me. Get lost.
Entries.fall_Thu: Hm?#$e#Isn't your name, like, %firstnameletter%name, or something?#$e#Oh. It's @? Okay. Sorry. I'll try to remember.'.
Entries.fall_Fri: I'm gonna lift 350 tonight, I think.#$b#I'm pretty dedicated, aren't I?$h#$e#Anything else you need?
Entries.fall_Sat: I think you can find salmon in the river this time of year.#$e#At least I think so. Thought I smelt Sam cooking some the other day.
Entries.fall_Sun: There's a grid ball game today!#e#I love fall Sundays.$u
Entries.fall_Fri6: I'm gonna do a ton of sit-ups tonight.#$e#You have to work super hard to reach your max potential.
Entries.fall_Mon4: My Granny told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I'm starting to think she may be right... I don't know.'$s
Entries.fall_Wed8: I made a bold decision today. I'm not gonna use gel for my hair anymore.'#$e#It'd really suck if I found out someone was only friends with me 'cuz of my hair gel.
Entries.winter_1: I don't really care for winter.'. There's too much snow to do anything fun, like practicing.#$e#I know some people like it, but I don't really get it.'.
Entries.winter_Mon: You like the snow? ...I'm praying for an early spring.'
Entries.winter_Tue: Hey, if you see Haley today, could you tell her I said hi?
Entries.winter_Tue_inlaw_Haley: Oh, hey. What's it like being married to Haley?'$9
Entries.winter_Wed: People stay indoors a lot during the winter. It's super boring.'.$s#$e#Maybe if I read a book I'd be less bored... Mmm, I'd rather not.'.
Entries.winter_Thu: Once I go pro, I'll be so rich I'll be able to afford a vacation house in the tropics.#$e#Then I won't have to deal with these dull ass winters.
Entries.winter_Fri: You came all serious weirdos living in this town.#$e#...Like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it. Like... Even in the summer! Doesn't he ever get hot?'
Entries.winter_Sun: There's a grid ball game today!'!#e#The only upside to this season.
Entries.winter_Fri4: You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#...That's nice of you. Hey, let's get you inside before you start freezing.'.$h
Entries.winter_Sat6: It's interesting that some people are so different than us, you know?#$b#I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine. It's nice to live with a bit of variety.'.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Can you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks, farmer.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, uhm... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself, I guess.$9
Entries.winter_Wed8: You know what? I think I'm gonna start reading a book today.'
Entries.winter_Thu6: I wish I could control the weather. I really hate the snow.
Entries.winter_Thu10: If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.#$e#That means you, too, @.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: With all this space in your farmhouse, I feel like I could really get into my workouts.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I never had many friends in town... I wonder sometimes where I'd be if you never showed up and swept me off my feet.'$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: I was planning to go for a jog today, but that's not really something I can do in this weather. ...Maybe tomorrow.'
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I barely just woke up and I'm already craving some protein.'$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I should start reading more books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm married!
Entries.patio_Alex: It feels great to lift weights outdoors! You should join me sometime.$6
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Did you have a good day, my love? I'm sure tomorrow will be even better. I'll make sure of it.'.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going, hon? I've been carrying my old grid ball around with me all day. Even if I'm not a pro, I could always pretend.'$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... it smells? I've been eating garlic all day. I read a little bit about vampires and I got a little scared... Sorry. I'll try to tone it down in the future. I just really don't want the vampires to get us.'.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I've been setting aside a few scraps for Dusty. She deserves a treat now and then.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I was hungry so I made some dinner. Here, I saved you a plate. [241 242 225 214 198]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Tthere's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my gorgeous husband. I love you, honey.$h^There's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my beautiful wife. I love you, honey.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, honey! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#If you wanna stay strong, a healthy diet's a big way to get there!'
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Come here. *squeeze*... Mmhmm. You're getting so strong from all that farm work.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm still getting used to cooking and doing laundry... It's not exactly my favorite, but I'd do anything to make your job easier. Not only that, but I just love to do things for you.'$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: There's a couple things around the house that I noticed are getting old or just aren't working anymore.'. I'll make sure to take care of it today.'
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: It feels good to push yourself to your limit sometimes, doesn't it? You'll really feel like you earned your place in bed tonight. You can sit back, I'll make sure you feel really good.'
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Did you get a haircut honey? You're looking really good today. Maybe it's all that fresh air, making you look like a God.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Tell me all about your day. I wanna hear about your life. Then when you're done... Well, we can continue in our room.'
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Hey... I got some new shorts today. I thought you'd like them on me.'$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: If you need some time to yourself, just let me know.
Entries.Outdoor_0: When I stand here and look out over our land... I'm really proud. You've done great work. You're amazing, honey.'
Entries.Outdoor_1: This would be a great place to raise children. I would've loved growing up in a place like this. So much room to run around!
Entries.Outdoor_2: I like to spend as much time outside as possible. It just feels better to be out here. It's too stuffy inside all the time.'.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our not-so-little farm. We make a cute couple.$h^Hey. Maybe it's the golden light, but you look beautiful today. I love you, my dear.$l
Entries.Outdoor_4: Ahh... It feels great to be outside. Stardew Valley really is the most beautiful place. But your beauty outshines everything.
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home dad.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Our %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like you. I love you.
Entries.OneKid_3: I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...? ...Probably not very fun.$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional grid ball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you. I'm so grateful to have you in my life, honey.'$l
Entries.Good_0: @... I will always love you. That fact will never change.$l
Entries.Good_1: You're so handsome... I don't tell you that enough.'$l^You're so beautiful... I don't tell you that enough.'$l
Entries.Good_6: I know you're strong, but sometimes I worry that you might get eaten by slimes... or worse. Just be careful, my love...$9
Entries.funLeave_Alex: I'm going into town today. I'll see you tonight, my love.
Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to see my grandparents often since they're getting pretty old. How was your day?
Entries.spring_1: Finally, the snow has melted and the sun is back! Can't wait to get out there!'$h
Entries.spring_6: I wonder if there's a such thing as stardrop protein powder? It'd probably help me bulk up.
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? I know you'll get first place, as always. Come here, my love.'
Entries.spring_23: Ttomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra sets tonight..$9#$e#Those suits are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely. ...It's kind of a weird event.'
Entries.summer_1: Summer's a very energetic time of year. At least it is for me, haha.
Entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the soup tomorrow?#$e#I have no idea what's good... You mind if I use some of our ingredients tonight?$h
Entries.summer_27: Summer's almost gone. Feels like just three weeks ago it arrived...$s
Entries.fall_1: Summer's over... but I'm trying to stay positive. The warmer seasons will always return, brighter than ever. Just like your sweet smile.
Entries.fall_15: Tomorrow's the Stardew fair. Do you plan on going?#$e#I think I am, but I can stay home if you'd like.'
Entries.fall_26: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. Grandpa's too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute, and Granny's so thin these days... She'll freeze her ass off before my Grandpa lets her turn up the heat..
Entries.winter_1: Make sure to stay warm this winter. I got these hand warmers from Zuzu city the other day. Maybe they'll help while you're working.
Entries.winter_7: Are you entering the fishing contest tomorrow? I think you should! You'll totally win it.'
Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. I'm looking forward to another year with you! Now, come closer... $l

Entries.Introduction: Oh...You must be that new farmer I've heard whispers of... Word of your arrival has sparked many conversations, my dear.#$b#I'm Elliott... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'll see you back in the valley, amore.
Entries.Resort_Leaving_2: Hopefully a crab hasn't snuck onto my clothes again.$s#$b#Imagine crawling out of a pocket and finding yourself on a beach hundreds of miles from home!$h#$e#Hmmm... But I suppose it would make for an interesting story.
Entries.Resort_Chair: I'm just taking a moment to cover myself in sunscreen... It'd be difficult to write if I'm in pain.$h
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus, I'll order a round for everyone!#$b#*hic*... Oh... I don't have my wallet.$s#$b#Remind me to bring it next time!
Entries.Resort_Wander: I've heard rumors of pirates coming to shore near here at night. They say it can get pretty wild! I'd like to see what they mean by that, wouldn't you?
Entries.Resort: This beach certainly puts my mind at ease. I imagine I'd be able to write endlessly if I was always this calm.
Entries.Resort_2: O-Oh... Some seaweed has found itself in my hair... Forget staying calm, this is... gross.
Entries.danceRejection: My apologies... but no thank you. Maybe another time?$s
Entries.divorced: ...$s#$e#Even after I chose to give up my quiet life... Have it your way, farmer.$s
Entries.dumped_Guys: I don't wish to ever see your face again, @.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: You've hurt me beyond the point of words... but I'm willing to leave the past behind us. Maybe it'll refuel my passion for writing.$s
Entries.breakUp: ...I see. I prayed such a day would never come, and yet...$s#$b#I suppose there'll be more for me in the future, though it'll have to be one without you.$s
Entries.Mon: I've only lived here a year longer than you, however, I feel more at home here than I did in my last place.$h#$e#I hope you manage to feel the same.
Entries.Mon4: I hope you've come to see this place as a safe sanctuary... or rather, a 'home'.
Entries.Tue: I always get my best ideas when I'm busy with other matters... And I imagine I'll remember it for once, but that's never the truth. Maybe I should start carrying a notepad with me...#$e#Well, I suppose I should just continue on with what I've got.
Entries.Tue6: The sound of pen on paper is the music of my soul.$u#$b#I'm lucky to have been able to settle on the beach. There's no other sound to disturb me.
Entries.Wed: Have you been to the forest, yet? It's really quite calming there.
Entries.Wed8: I'm feeling a bit down today...$s#$e#I wish I could write my future, so I'd be sure of what's to come.$s#$e#I love the peace and quiet... but I don't want to grow old on the beach by myself.$s
Entries.Thu2: I'm having a hard time finding inspiration for my novel.$s
Entries.Thu4: I've been feeling uplifted recently. Maybe it's just something in the wind.
Entries.Thu6: Sometimes I wonder if my writing 'skills' are just me being full of myself and not accepting the fact that I'm not meant to be an author...$s#$e#Mmm... Don't mind me.
Entries.Thu8: #$1 elliottApol#The other townsfolk are so kind... but they don't really seem interested in ever getting to know me... so I apologize if I was too forward with you when we first met. I was just eager to have a friend.$k#$e#It feels... good. To have a close friend like you, I mean. ...Thank you.
Entries.Thu: Hello, @.#$e#I hope you're doing well on this fine Thursday.
Entries.Fri: The fresh air of this valley does well to soothe my soul.#$e#A quick stroll outdoors somehow always finds a way to inspire me.
Entries.Fri4: Ah... be careful when getting close to my hair with hot things, please...$8
Entries.Fri8: It takes me so long in the morning to get my hair looking like this... And it's starting to get expensive, *hehe*.
Entries.Sat: I like my cabin, but you probably wouldn't. It's kind of nice to have it dark in there most of the time, but the spiders do often freak me out.$s
Entries.Sat4: I hope you can excuse the decrepit state of my home.
Entries.Sat6: A lot of people in the valley are quite outgoing, but a few of us are pretty shy, too. It's nice to see you trying to break people out of their shells.#$e#Everyone likes to have friends, even that grumpy blacksmith, Clint.
Entries.Sun: Hello, there. I hope your life as a farmer is going as well as it possibly can be.
Entries.Sun6: Oh, @! I was hoping I'd get to see you today, hehe.#$e#It's always a pleasure to see your charming face.$h
Entries.event_idea1: Mystery, hm? That is quite an exciting genre. I'll try to remember that.
Entries.event_idea2: Ah, one of the most classic genres. I'll try to remember that.
Entries.event_idea3: I would've never guessed! I suppose even farmers sometimes have their heads in the stars.$h#$b#I'll remember that.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about another man. This is... reassuring, to say the least.$l^I am, as well.$l
Entries.event_toast2: That's a fantastic idea!$h#$b#Here's... to us!
Entries.event_toast4: Ah, to a positive future for the community... what a beautiful idea.#$b#Here's to Pelican Town!
Entries.summer_Mon: A gentle ray of sun woke me up this morning. I've never felt so refreshed.
Entries.summer_Mon4: I know I can be quite... 'strange'.#$e#I hope you don't mind, too much.$h
Entries.summer_Mon6: It's comforting to know that you believe in my abilities as an author, @. It means a lot to me.$h
Entries.summer_Tue: I've laid eyes on some of the most beautiful shells outside my home.#$e#I would imagine the rarer and more beautiful varieties to be quite valuable...
Entries.summer_Tue6: My goal with my works is to connect people from all walks of life...$u#$e#*sigh* But it's different these days. There aren't many people who still read books, these days.$s
Entries.summer_Wed: It must be satisfying to watch your crops grow up from seeds to edible treats.#$e#That must be how parents feel about their children... without the edible part. ...Actually, forget everything I just said.$u
Entries.summer_Thu: I've got sand in my shoes...$s#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach. There have to be cons for every pro.
Entries.summer_Fri: @? You look a bit pale.#$b# Are you getting dizzy? I can go call Harvey if you need me to.
Entries.summer_Sat: The sun feels angry today... My skin is a bit too delicate. I may need to stay home the rest of today.
Entries.summer_Sun: You made your way all the way here just to strike up a conversation with me? How kind... thank you.$h
Entries.summer_Sun4: You may visit my cabin whenever you like. I always enjoy your peaceful company.$h
Entries.fall_Mon: Hello @.#$e#Make sure and take breaks from your work whenever you can manage to.
Entries.fall_Mon4: Come visit me if you ever need a break from your work.$h#$e#It's always a safe bet to check my house for me, first.
Entries.fall_Tue: There are rumors that a pirate's ship full of gold shipwrecked here a long time ago... I wonder if it really is just a rumor, though.
Entries.fall_Tue8: Oh, @, I was just thinking about you.$l#$e#Maybe you sensed it.$h#$e#So! Would you like to tell me about your day?.
Entries.fall_Wed8: I don't think I'd mind living my life on a farm.#$e#The quiet atmosphere might be a good source of literary inspiration, don't you think?$h
Entries.fall_Thu: Oh! A tiny crab seems to have made their home in my shirt pocket.$l#$e#Hmhm... I guess that'll happen when you spend most of your time on the beach.
Entries.fall_Fri4: My legs are sore from sitting at my desk all night.$s#$e#Sometimes I envy you, @. You never seem to have that type of problem.
Entries.fall_Fri: My legs are feeling a bit stiff from sitting at my desk this morning.$s
Entries.fall_Fri10: I feel so creative when I'm with you. I've had to start carrying a notepad to contain my thoughts....$l#$e#I know my newfound creativity may be... strange, but it's... calming, as well.
Entries.fall_Sat: It gets so windy around this time of year. It's hard to manage my hair when it happens.$h
Entries.fall_Sun: I need to remember to water my plants today. Last time I forgot, I rushed out to the ocean to get some, but the salt water ended up killing my poor succulents.
Entries.winter_Mon: You've come to visit me even in the cold?#$e#It's nice to see a warm face amongst the contrasting weather
Entries.winter_Mon4: You made your way through the snow to visit me?#$e#I'm honored, amore!$h
Entries.winter_Tue: For years people have needed to get their living from the sea, such as Willy.#$e#I just go to the grocery store. I feel a bit privileged.$s
Entries.winter_Tue10: I hoped you would show up.#$e#Maybe the red string of fate brought you to me, hehe.$l
Entries.-winter_Wed: A day can never be boring when you simply follow the urges of your imagination, hehe..$u#$e#Ah... sorry, does that even make any sense?
Entries.winter_Thu: Breathe deeply. Do you notice it? That's the smell of the sea.#$e#How does it make you feel?
Entries.winter_Thu6: Mmm... I can smell it. The salt from the sea. Can you smell it too?#$e#I love that smell. It reminds me of when I was little.
Entries.winter_Fri: Taking care of my hair is such a bother. If I don't brush it through every day, I'll find it in a fit of knots...#$e#It's a lot of work.#$e#I'm surprised I haven't given up on it and just shaved it all off.
Entries.winter_Sat: I've been doing some indoor exercises since it's been too cold to go out.#$e#I apologize if it's a bit humid in my cabin.$s
Entries.winter_Sun: It's been a while since the last time I scrubbed my floorboards. I think it's about time for another.$s#$e#I imagine you're always quite busy, but are you able to make time for cleaning?
